Bind lightboxes to there content using a hash that translates to the elements ID. i.e. clicking a lightbox link with the href #!weather/editor would display the div with the id weather-editor.

For AJAX lightboxes, the href should be the link to the page to be displayed, followed by a hash ID as above. i.e. clicking a lightbox link with the href http://skyglobal.github.io/webtoolkit#!toolkit/show would AJAX in the page http://skyglobal.github.io/webtoolkit and give the lightbox the ID toolkit-show.

Please try to use RESTful hashes where possible and ensure the lightbox link has an ID (for accessibility; this helps us label the lightbox for screen-readers)
